WorkItem.ClosedComment: Can you upgrade to the latest TypeScript release and see if there is still an issue? Please file a new bug on GitHub if you're still having problems.
WorkItem.Description: I start looking at Typescript today and felt very frustrating just because there is no intellisense.

Comments.Message: Um, yes there is, so you're either doing something wrong, or the install failed (or both). ;)  More details would be nice.
Try running the installer again and do a "repair".  I think that fixed an issue for me before.

Thanks @james, I did reinstall and repair, still no luck.

I am using windows 8 64bit, visual studio 2012 Ultimate. .NET 4.5.51641.
What type of project are you using? Just the TypeScript HTMLApp template or something else? Which installer did you use?

@danquirk , Yes. I use TypeScript's first tutorial project. 

I use TypeScript installer 1.0.1
